column4: i have a problem, i have a folder with user2:group2 permissions and chmod 0770, problem is i am user1 and i am part of group2, however I cannot access this folder, WHY?
i have a problem, i have a folder with user2:group2 permissions and chmod 0770, problem is i am user1 and i am part of group2, however I cannot access this folder, WHY?
have you checked what the permissions are on the files in the folder?
that's true of the last couple HP printers I did that with.
